H0.text: Who replaced Iraqi President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr in July 1979. Saddam Hussein

H1.text: Who replaced Iraqi President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr in July 1979. Abdul Karim Kassem

H2.text: Who replaced Iraqi President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr in July 1979. Tariq Aziz

H3.text: Who replaced Iraqi President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr in July 1979. HVD-1

A4.text: Saddam acted to secure his grip on power by forcing the ailing al-Bakr to resign on 16 July 1979, and formally assumed the presidency.
